duties_responsibilities.duty: Direct and monitor all activities in the control room of the EGT export facility, ensuring smooth operations.
Make appropriate process adjustments to ensure target product quality goals and standards are achieved.
Enter descriptive work orders in the SAP program for necessary repairs or maintenance assistance.
Take the lead in recommending equipment shutdowns and start-ups to minimize operational down time.
Ensure that all equipment is in a safe and secure mode at all times during plant shutdowns.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED required
